text: "Your Love Is King" is a 1984 debut single by singer Sade and is the leading single from their debut studio album Diamond Life. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 54 in the United States, number 2 in New Zealand, number 7 in Ireland, number 5 in Italy and number 64 in Australia. ==Track listings== *UK, US, and Dutch 7-inch single :A. "Your Love Is King" – 3:39 :B. "Love Affair with Life" (recorded live) – 4:35 *UK and Dutch 12-inch maxi single :A1. "Your Love Is King" – 3:58 :B1. "Smooth Operator"/"Snake Bite" – 7:28 :B2. "Love Affair with Life" (recorded live) – 4:35 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Debut singles Category:Sade (band) songs
title: Your Love Is King
